players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Alice, Bob is the mafioso. We need to vote him out to keep the town safe."
You: "Alice here. Charlie, why do you accuse Bob without any explanation? We need evidence, not just claims. Let's discuss calmly before voting."

Charlie: "Alice, I understand your caution. As detective, I investigated Bob last night and confirmed he is mafia. If we hesitate, Bob could kill again tonight. Trust me on this—let's vote him out now."
You: "Alice here. Charlie, if you truly are the detective and have solid proof against Bob, then voting him out now is our best chance to save the town. I will vote for Bob."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
